pullrequest.title: fix gearbox to use local reference frame

content.raw:
moved `ODEGearboxJoint_TEST.cc` to `test/integration/joint_gearbox.cc`.
Added gearbox ratio API to `Joint::SetAttribute("gearbox_ratio", value)` and `Joint::GetAttribute("gearbox_ratio")`.
Changed API from `GearboxJoint::GetGearRatio` and `GearboxJoint::SetGearRatio` to `GearboxJoint::GetGearboxRatio` and `GearboxJoint::SetGearboxRatio` to be more consistent.
content.html: moved ODEGearboxJoint_TEST.cc to test/integration/joint_gearbox.cc. Added gearbox ratio API to Joint::SetAttribute("gearbox_ratio", value) and Joint::GetAttribute("gearbox_ratio"). Changed API from GearboxJoint::GetGearRatio and GearboxJoint::SetGearRatio to GearboxJoint::GetGearboxRatio and GearboxJoint::SetGearboxRatio to be more consistent.
